page.title: 07Horticultural Society
page.content:
Horticultural Society - Letham.
The society was founded in 1890. A summer show is held on the 2nd Saturday in August and a Bulb Show is usually held in February or March. (This year, instead of a Bulb Show, a Gardener's Question Time was organised in the Village Hall.) The main event is the Letham Show. It is held in a field at a local farm. There is a large marquee where people enter flowers, vegetables, baking, jam, wine and craft work to be judged. There are special competitions for children. In the afternoon a gym khana is held. Refreshments such as coffee, ice cream and juice may be bought. August 1985 will see the 83rd Show.
